alert.note: Alert for Adams; Arapahoe (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 9:34PM MDT until June 08 at 10:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Arapahoe County in northeastern Colorado... Central Adams County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 1015 PM MDT. * At 933 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northeastern Aurora, or 17 miles east of Denver, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Northeastern Aurora, Bennett, Watkins, Strasburg, Manila Village and Byers. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
